mapper.update: update individual set ifileids=#{ifileids, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ino=#{ino}
update individual set likes = likes + 1 where ino=#{ino}
update individual set likes = likes - 1 where ino=#{ino}
update individual set applycount = applycount + 1 where ino=#{ino}
mapper.select: select * from ( select * from individual order by ino desc) where rownum <= 6
select * from ( select * from individual where (ititle||icontent||istatus||iaddress||idealType||regdate||price) like '%'||#{kwd}||'%' order by ino desc ) where rownum <= 6
select * from ( select * from individual where ino <=#{inoToStart} order by ino desc) where rownum <= 6

select * from ( select * from individual where ino <=#{ino} and (ititle||icontent||istatus||addressCity||addressTown||idealType||regdate||price) like '%'||#{kwd}||'%' order by ino desc) where rownum <= 6
select count(*) from individual where userno=#{userno}
select count(*) from individual where userno=#{userno} and istatus='등록완료'
